docs.snippet: Companies are spending millions of dollars to get ready for a British exit from the European Union and, with little idea of what that would look like, are preparing for higher costs and moving their headquarters from Britain....
docs.lead_paragraph: Companies are spending millions of dollars to get ready for a British exit from the European Union and, with little idea of what that would look like, are preparing for higher costs and moving their headquarters from Britain.

headline.main: Companies Spend Millions to Gauge Brexit Impact
headline.print_headline: Companies Spend Millions to Gauge Brexit Impact

docs.snippet: A report in the British media whose origins were not revealed said 30,000 additional civil servants would be needed to negotiate departure from the E.U....
docs.lead_paragraph: A report in the British media whose origins were not revealed said 30,000 additional civil servants would be needed to negotiate departure from the E.U.
docs.abstract: Leaked memo hints that British government may need six additional months to formulate plan for leaving European Union and extra 30,000 civil servants to manage complex task; Prime Min Theresa May denies memo was prepared for government.

headline.main: Leaked ‘Brexit’ Memo Says U.K. Is Unsure How to Proceed
headline.print_headline: Leaked Memo Says Britain Is Unsure How to Proceed on E.U. Exit

byline.original: By STEVEN ERLANGER and KIMIKO DE FREYTAS-TAMURA
